Posts.Content: a few months ago i noticed that i had  changes in my left breast went to my family doctor he sent me to someone.she sends me for tests a nother mamogram  a ultra sound a mri and a needle biopsy all of that came back inconclusive.it now 3 months later and it has gotten a little worse doctor has sent me for yet another mamogram and ultra sound tests came back inconcluive yet again with the suggestion that she do an exploritory surgry on that breast.i am having surgry this friday i hope and pray she gets some ansers for me. my mother past away from ibc. i have all the signs of ibc but the tests come back inconclusive has this happed to any one else out there if so please reply. it hard not to worry given my family history.;
Posts.Title: worried and scared

Posts.Content: thanks for your reply. i accually want friday my surgry day to get here so this can all be figured out one way or another. its so hard going to work every day and putting all of my attention on my work load.i just need ansers now.thank you for listening and i hope u get some anser your self.
Posts.Title: worried and scared

Posts.Content: had a memogram (magnified) then a ultra sound it is picking up something un my arm and a mass in the left breast.so given my family history i have to have a mri ok waitrd for the app but they r going to do memagram and ulyra sound again and do yet another biopsy so i go to the appts memogram and altra sound is done again.they send me to get a mri heres there kicker nothing is showing up on the mri.the next day i go for the core needel ultra sound guided biopsy they r fairly certain that i have breast cancer,now i wait for 10 days to get all the results.BUT I WOULD LIKE TO HEAR I THIS HAPPENED TO ANYONE ELSE NOTHING SHOW ON MRI
Posts.Title: mri did show breast cancer

Posts.Content: i know its really hard wiyhout your mom i to lost my mom to cancerit has been ten years since her passing on but it still hurts.now i have been told that i too have breast cancer the same one mom started with but i accually have drawn on what she went through to get me through this.i also know it kinda stings to see your dad move on with someone else my dad did the same thing i think as long as she is good to him i good with it.even though your mom isnt physically walking this earth with you i can tell u she is with u every step u take and dont worry she will be with u on those important moments. my mom is with me all the time just think of all the stuff u 2 used to do all the disagreements all the hugs and tears u shared. just remember your mom is yoiur mom no mastter where she is and if u r open to it she wikk be with u always
Posts.Title: Moving On

Posts.Content: Had mammo, ultra sound, needle biopsy, mri 3 months ago.Had a surgercal biopsy in three places on the left breast last friday then the doctors came to my room and said it will be about 2 to 3 weeks before we get results back.S0 i have my appointment made for oct 25/12 so far way.When i was waiting to be taken to the or one of my doctors comes in and look at me kinda funny and said u had that mark on your face long she did a biopsy on that to for skin cancer as if i dont have enough to worry about.I am so glad i am going back to work how else do u deal with all the waiting?
Posts.Title: waiting for results
